channel.title: Need help changing the exp gained
channel.description: Uhmm.. im new at coding and stuff.. but im wondering how i can change how much exp you get when attacking something.. cause i want it to level alot slower so my server has meaning.. Can you please help me... Thanks. You attack NPC's to train in my server..

THANKS!!

item.source: Need help changing the exp gained

item.title: Need help changing the exp gained
item.dc:creator: @lolaccount lolaccount
item.description:
@lolaccount wrote:

[quote=“p e e p z i, post:7, topic:227837”]Search for public void CalculateMaxHit() { and scroll down a little bit and you should see somthing like this.

Code:
public void CalculateMaxHit() {

[code] /* max hits fixed by anarchy*/
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength

	if(strLow) { //Burst Of Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.05);
	} else if(strMid) { //Super Human Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.10);
	} else if(strHigh) { //Ultimate Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.15);
	}
    if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { // Accurate & Defensive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.8275862068965517241379310344828));
    } else if (FightType == 2) { // Aggresive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 5) { // Lash
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 3) { // Controlled
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.7586206896551724137931034482759));
    }
    if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0014);
    } else if (StrPotion == 2) { // Super Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0205);
    }
    if (StrPrayer == 1) { // Burst Of Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.005);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { // Super Human Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.01);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { // Ultimate Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.015);
    }               
    if (FullDharokEquipped()) {
        MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])
                - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
                        / 2;
    }
    playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);
}[/code][/quote]

Ive got…

[CODE] public void CalculateMaxHit() {

    /* max hits fixed by anarchy*/
    double MaxHit = 0;
    int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
    int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength

    if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { // Accurate & Defensive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.8275862068965517241379310344828));
    } else if (FightType == 2) { // Aggresive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 3) { // Controlled
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.7586206896551724137931034482759));
    }
    if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0014);
    } else if (StrPotion == 2) { // Super Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0205);
    }
    if (StrPrayer == 1) { // Burst Of Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.005);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { // Super Human Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.01);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { // Ultimate Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.015);
    }               
    if (FullDharokEquipped()) {
        MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])
                - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
                        / 2;[/CODE]

I dont know what to change though…

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the exp gained

item.title: Need help changing the exp gained
item.dc:creator: @p_e_e_p_z_i p e e p z i
item.description:
@p_e_e_p_z_i wrote:

Search for public void CalculateMaxHit() { and scroll down a little bit and you should see somthing like this.

Code:
public void CalculateMaxHit() {

[code] /* max hits fixed by anarchy*/
double MaxHit = 0;
int StrBonus = playerBonus[10]; // Strength Bonus
int Strength = playerLevel[playerStrength]; // Strength

	if(strLow) { //Burst Of Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.05);
	} else if(strMid) { //Super Human Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.10);
	} else if(strHigh) { //Ultimate Strength
		Strength += (Strength*0.15);
	}
    if (FightType == 1 || FightType == 4) { // Accurate & Defensive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.8275862068965517241379310344828));
    } else if (FightType == 2) { // Aggresive
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 5) { // Lash
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.6551724137931034482758620689655));
    } else if (FightType == 3) { // Controlled
        MaxHit += ((double) ((double) StrBonus + Strength)
                / ((double) 6.7586206896551724137931034482759));
    }
    if (StrPotion == 1) { // Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0014);
    } else if (StrPotion == 2) { // Super Strength Potion
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.0205);
    }
    if (StrPrayer == 1) { // Burst Of Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.005);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 2) { // Super Human Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.01);
    } else if (StrPrayer == 3) { // Ultimate Strength
        MaxHit += (double) (Strength * 0.015);
    }               
    if (FullDharokEquipped()) {
        MaxHit += (getLevelForXP(playerXP[playerHitpoints])
                - playerLevel[playerHitpoints])
                        / 2;
    }
    playerMaxHit = (int) Math.floor(MaxHit);
}[/code]

Read full topic
